import React from 'react'; const Post = (props) => { const post = [ { complete:{ description:"Défi relevé avec brio, belle gosse pour fluncher non ?!", photo:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1605992582137-6ee2730fff6d?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=732&q=80", }, detail:[ { categorie:"Top", photo:"https://www.lamodeuse.com/293738-thickbox_default/crop-top-blanc-cotele-dos-nu.jpg", prix:25.95, marque:"" }, { categorie:"Bas", photo:"https://img01.ztat.net/article/spp-media-p1/4dc180e159a242748346b699d4345e3b/67a91c5812454a788740dedbb9197c60.jpg?imwidth=1800&filter=packshot", prix:25.95, marque:"" }, { categorie:"Chaussure", photo:"https://www.modress.com/ori-escarpins-beiges-vernis-7696_16684.jpg", prix:25.95, marque:"" }, { categorie:"Accessoire", photo:"https://www.nanoucreations.com/userfiles/image/produit/grd/collier-cascade-or-tvhq-ppnh.jpg", prix:25.95, marque:"" }, ], defi: { titre:"Chic en blanc pour aller fluncher", semaine:"24 au 30 janvier 2022", date_debut:"24/01/2022", date_fin:"30/01/2022", regle:[ { nom:"Budjet", valeur:"200 €" }, { nom:"Type de commerce", valeur:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Delai", valeur:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], participantNb:3, fini:false, }, user: { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", dateCreation:"le 3 janvier 2022", points:2352, status:"Morphologie de type B majuscule", resaux:[ { nom:"Instagram", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"200 €" }, { nom:"Tweeter", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], proprietaire:true, }, prix:230.55, like:29, likeUsers:[ { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], proprietaire:true, }, { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", dateCreation:"le 3 janvier 2022", points:2352, status:"Morphologie de type B majuscule", resaux:[ { nom:"Instagram", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"200 €" }, { nom:"Tweeter", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], proprietaire:true, }, ], note_et_commentaire:[ { note:8, commentaire:"The backdrop-filter CSS property lets you apply graphical effects such as blurring or color shifting to the area behind an element. Because it applies to everything behind the element, to see the effect you must make the element or its background at least partially transparent.", user: { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", dateCreation:"le 3 janvier 2022", points:2352, status:"Morphologie de type B majuscule", resaux:[ { nom:"Instagram", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"200 €" }, { nom:"Tweeter", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], proprietaire:true, } }, { note:8, commentaire:"The backdrop-filter CSS property lets you apply graphical effects such as blurring or color shifting to the area behind an element. Because it applies to everything behind the element, to see the effect you must make the element or its background at least partially transparent.", user: { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", dateCreation:"le 3 janvier 2022", points:2352, status:"Morphologie de type B majuscule", resaux:[ { nom:"Instagram", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"200 €" }, { nom:"Tweeter", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], proprietaire:true, } }, { note:8, commentaire:"The backdrop-filter CSS property lets you apply graphical effects such as blurring or color shifting to the area behind an element. Because it applies to everything behind the element, to see the effect you must make the element or its background at least partially transparent.", user: { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", dateCreation:"le 3 janvier 2022", points:2352, status:"Morphologie de type B majuscule", resaux:[ { nom:"Instagram", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"200 €" }, { nom:"Tweeter", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne" }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin" }, ], proprietaire:true, } }, ], note_generale:7.75, note_image:"https://i.pinimg.com/originals/90/c0/9f/90c09f347eb2b9b59e1d37a18b5b75f1.gif", commentaire_nbre:1, date:"il y a 1 jour" } ] const posts = post.map(p =>

{p.defi.titre}

{p.user.username} {p.date}

{p.complete.description}

Moyenne générale {p.note_generale} 10
{ e.target.parentElement.parentElement.classList.remove("act") }}>

{p.like} personnes aiment cette tenue :

{ p.likeUsers.map(l =>
{l.username}
) }
{ e.target.parentElement.parentElement.classList.remove("act") }}>
{ p.note_et_commentaire.map(l =>
{l.user.username}
{l.note} 10
{l.commentaire}
) }
{ e.target.parentElement.parentElement.classList.remove("act") }}>

Noter cette tenue :

{ p.detail.map(d =>
{d.categorie}
) }
{ console.log(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[1]) e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[1].classList.contains("act") ? e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[1].classList.remove("act"): console.log("fermer") console.log(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[2]) e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[2].classList.contains("act") ? e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[2].classList.remove("act"): console.log("fermer") setTimeout(() => e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[0].classList.add("act"),500) }}> {p.like} personnes aiment cette tenue { console.log(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[0]) e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[0].classList.contains("act") ? e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[0].classList.remove("act"): console.log("fermer") console.log(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[2]) e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[2].classList.contains("act") ? e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[2].classList.remove("act"): console.log("fermer") setTimeout(() => e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[1].classList.add("act"),500) }}> {p.commentaire_nbre} personnes ont noté et commenté { console.log(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[0]) e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[0].classList.contains("act") ? e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[0].classList.remove("act"): console.log("fermer") console.log(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[1]) e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[1].classList.contains("act") ? e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[1].classList.remove("act"): console.log("fermer") setTimeout(() => e.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.children[2].classList.add("act"),500) }}> Noter cette tenue
) return (
{posts}
); } export default Post;
